'''Davis Calder''' is the husband of [[Samantha Calder]], a patient at [[Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital]].

==History==
===Wife’s Illness===
He was supportive of his wife while she was ill, despite getting sick of the yoga music they used to keep her calm in order to prevent further heart attacks.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
====[[Samantha Calder]]====
Davis is married to Samantha Calder. They both seemed excited at the prospect of having babies after Samantha's surgery.
